'''Alpha 1.0.4.0''' (also known as 1.0.4 build 1) is the first build version released for [[Pocket Edition 1.0.4|1.0.4]]. It adds villager trading and fixes many bugs and crashes.<ref>{{tweet|_tomcc|831326018103189505|And here's my ghetto changelog screenshot, until it goes live on http://pocketbeta.minecraft.net :)|Feb 13, 2017}}</ref><ref>{{cite|url=https://feedback.minecraft.net/hc/en-us/articles/360004125612|title=MCPE Android Beta - 1.0.4 Build 1}}</ref>

== Additions ==
* Added [[Trading|villager trading]]
* New Add-On format

== Changes ==
* The models for the [[shulker]] and [[ender dragon]] can now be edited using Add-Ons
* [[Husk]]s are now a little bit taller than [[zombie]]s
* Baby [[villager]]s now have adorable, larger-sized heads

== Fixes ==
* {{bug|MCPE-1982}} Fixed mobs going out of [[fence]]s when reloading a world
* {{bug|MCPE-8166}} [[Lava]] will no longer leak out of a blacksmith's house
* {{bug|MCPE-19097}} The [[Nether star]] can no longer be destroyed by explosions
* {{bug|MCPE-13215}} Mobs should really no longer walk in circles if they spawn or walk on a block made from two slabs
* {{bug|MCPE-17278}}, {{bug|MCPE-13613}} Fixed an issue where Villagers would no longer breed
* {{bug|MCPE-18258}} [[Arrow]]s will no longer turn black after hitting opaque blocks
* {{bug|MCPE-18162}} [[Cape]]s will no longer appear when wearing [[elytra]]
* {{bug|MCPE-18161}} Fixed the message that appears after flying into a wall with elytra
* {{bug|MCPE-18606}} Fixed an issue where players could not sleep through the night if there were players in another dimension
* {{bug|MCPE-18531}} Fixed medium/large-sized [[slime]]s and [[magma cube]]s not having jumping or landing sounds
* {{bug|MCPE-19396}} Destroying a [[painting]] no longer destroys the block behind it
* {{bug|MCPE-19038}} Fixed the [[End gateway]] in The End regenerating repeatedly
* {{bug|MCPE-18752}} [[Donkey]]s once again spawn in the [[plain]]s biome
* {{bug|MCPE-16320}} Chiseled and smooth sandstone now have the correct bottom textures
* {{bug|MCPE-19818}} Fixed chunks that can't be refreshed completely when the client receives new chunk data
* {{bug|MCPE-19636}} Fixed rotated item texture on dropped [[anvil]]s
* {{bug|MCPE-13602}} Villagers will no longer wander too far away from their [[village]]
* Villagers spawned using the {{cmd|summon}} command will no longer just spawn as farmers
* [[Zombie villager]]s of different variants now keep their professions when importing a world from 0.15.9 or earlier
* [[Villager]]s will now run slower when attacked
* Items that must be placed on blocks (ie. [[rail]]s and [[torch]]es) can now be properly placed on top [[slab]]s
* Fixed dying twice when hit with two different sources of damage
* Fixed the positioning of mobs that are sitting on other mobs
* [[Spider jockey]]s will now properly spawn with [[stray]]s or [[wither skeleton]]s if the conditions are correct
* Ridden mobs (ie. spider jockeys) can now be pulled into minecarts
* "The End... Again...” achievement will now unlock properly
* Fixed a crash that was caused by [[ocean monument]]s and Nether bridges generating
* Fixed infinitely burning fires that would cause gradual slowdown and spread more often
* Fixed a crash when a player changes dimension and there are other nearby players
* Players who receive more than one stack with the {{cmd|give}} command now see the correct number of items received in the chat
* Fixed several texture issues in the Candy Texture Pack
* Fixed a crash when importing a file into the game (iOS only)
* Fixed a crash when exiting a game session
* Fixed crashes when launching a world with Behavior Packs and Resource Packs that had errors in the pack manifests</onlyinclude>
